title: Are per capita CO₂ emissions above or below the global average?
subtitle: This map denotes whether a country's average per capita emissions are above or below the value of global per capita emissions. This is based on territorial emissions, which don't adjust for trade.
internalNotes: After an update, go to "Basic", click on the variable "Annual CO₂ emissions (per capita)" to open it in a separate tab. On the preview, open the chart tab and select the World. Find the value for emissions in the latest year informed. Insert that value here in the "Map" tab, as the upper limit of the first map bracket.
